title: Starmap
explanation: Move the map via dragging. Click on a star opens a info window where you can send fleets.

starDetailIcons.yes: Showing our fleets, fleet movements and shipyards.
starDetailIcons.no: NOT Showing our fleets, fleet movements and shipyards.

legend.playerRelation: Diplomatic relation to owner is shown (dot bottom left)

star.title: Star Scan: {name}
star.fleetsMovingHere: Our fleet en route to this star | Our fleets en route to this star
star.fleetsLabel: Click to check fleet on 'Fleets' page

sendHere.headline: Move Fleets to this system
sendHere.travelTime: Number of turns it takes the fleet to move to this star.
